SET UP AND MAINTAIN NET ZERO CLOUD
Deploy CRM Analytics Apps for Net Zero Cloud

Bring your environmental accounting in line with your financial accounting by using the CRM Analytics apps for Net Zero Cloud. Create an app from a template to get ready-made dashboards and KPIs that your team can use out of the box or customize to meet your needs.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited Editions with Net Zero Cloud and CRM Analytics for Net Zero Cloud add-on license.
USER PERMISSIONS
To setup CRM Analytics apps for Net Zero Cloud:	CRM Analytics Plus Admin and Net Zero Analytics Admin
Set Up CRM Analytics Apps for Net Zero Cloud
Create a CRM Analytics app for Net Zero Cloud to get dashboards that monitor sustainability efforts and track carbon emissions across different organizational levels by using the Net Zero Analytics and DEI Analytics app templates.
Manage Analytics Dashboards for Net Zero Cloud
The analytics apps for Net Zero Cloud include prebuilt analytics dashboards that you can embed in Lightning Experience pages. The dashboards such as What-If Analysis and DEI Insights, require you to import external data to show relevant analytics.
Understand Net Zero Analytics Licenses
Net Zero Analytics licenses provide different levels of access to CRM Analytics in Net Zero Cloud.
